hero-description: Real-Time Song Ranking and Tipping for Live Events. Create the ultimate concert experience, tailored by your audience.
search-events-placeholder: Search Events by Location, Artist, or Event Code

1.title: List Your Songs
1.description: Upload the songs you're ready to perform, creating an interactive setlist that sets the stage for fan engagement.

2.title: Generate Event Code
2.description: Once your setlist is ready, generate a unique event code. Share this code with your audience to kickstart the interactive ranking.

3.title: See What Fans Want
3.description: As fans join and rank your songs, you'll see real-time updates. This dynamic setlist guides you on what hits to play next.

4.title: Rock the Stage!
4.description: With a fan-curated setlist in hand, take the stage and make live updates as you perform each song.

1.title: Enter Event Code
1.description: Use the unique event code to access the artist's interactive setlist. Your digital ticket to shaping the concert is just a code away.

2.title: Vote for Your Jams
2.description: Once inside, you'll see the artist's song list. Rank your favorites and watch as the setlist evolves based on fan votes.

3.title: Buy Extra Votes (Optional)
3.description: Passionate about a song? You can purchase extra votes to give your top picks a ranking boost.

4.title: Enjoy the Show!
4.description: Sit back and enjoy as the artist performs the crowd's top picks. Watch the setlist update in real-time as each song is played.

features-tagline: Elevate Your Live Music Experience with Interactive, Real-Time Rewards
feature-dynamic-desc: Upload and manage your song repertoire for fan-driven rankings
feature-code-desc: Generate secure, one-time codes for each live event
feature-insights-desc: See which songs are fan favorites as the event unfolds
feature-monetization-desc: Enable tipping and extra vote purchases for added revenue
question-1: What is an event code and how do I generate it?
question-2: How can I see what songs my fans want me to play?
question-3: Is there a way to change the setlist during the event?
question-4: How do I earn from fans buying votes?
question-5: Can I encourage fans to buy votes or tip during the event?
